role_description: An Ansible role that installs AptCacherNG on a server or configures clients to use the AptCacherNG endpoint
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs AptCacherNG on a server or configures clients to use the AptCacherNG endpoint. Apt-Cacher-NG is a caching proxy server (or apt proxy) for Debian based distributions like Ubuntu, Kubuntu, Xubuntu, Edubuntu, Linux Mint, etc, which is used to cache the downloaded packages locally on your server.
